channel.title: Compiler help and I posted in the right one above too
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/sun/tools/javac/M ain Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.sun.tools.javac.Main at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: com.sun.tools.javac.Main. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . I have no idea what's wrong, This is what my compiler looks like. [b]@echo off title Twiztid Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/b]
Please help!

item.title: Compiler help and I posted in the right one above too
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Brandon12111 Mod Brandon12111
item.description:
@Mod_Brandon12111 wrote:

it’s not working still. this is what i get now

javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

HELP!!!

Read full topic
item.source: Compiler help and I posted in the right one above too

item.title: Compiler help and I posted in the right one above too
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Brandon12111 Mod Brandon12111
item.description:
@Mod_Brandon12111 wrote:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/sun/tools/javac/M
ain
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.sun.tools.javac.Main
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: com.sun.tools.javac.Main. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .
I have no idea what’s wrong, This is what my compiler looks like.
@echo off
title Twiztid Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Please help!

Read full topic
item.source: Compiler help and I posted in the right one above too
